an3.144:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing three qualities, a bhikkhu is best among devas and humans: one who has reached the ultimate conclusion, won ultimate security from bondage, lived the ultimate spiritual life, and gained the ultimate consummation. What three?() The wonder of psychic potency, (2) the wonder of mind-reading, and (3) the wonder of instruction.
